OBJECTIVE: To obtain a position at work as a most useful person by application of 
my skills and knowledge and contributing maximum to the organisation.
A dynamic professional with 6+ Years of Experience  in Heat Ventilation and Air
Conditioning Systems Installation & Design as following.  
1) Currently working with Isolux Corsan Ingenieria.S.A. As a Station Manager (Sr. 
Engineer) at DMRC PROJECT (Dashrathpuri CE10 & 11 Lot-4) Since 21 
September 2015 to till now.
Job Responsibilities:- 
Project involves Installation, Testing, and Commissioning & Building management system
of HVAC System for the under-ground station DMRC.
To  supervising  activates  like  Site  mobilization,  Material  management,  Man-power
management.
Check for installation of ECS System like water cooled Chiller, Air cooled Chiller, Water
package Unit, AHU, FCU, Duct, Pipe, Pump, fans, and other equipment etc. as per
drawing.
Check for installation of TVS System like TVF Fan, TVS Damper, Sound Attenuator, and
other equipment etc. as per drawing.
Coordinates with other services related to site issues.
Preparing M.B & Raising Bills.
Site progress Report to DMRC and our own office.
2)Worked as a HVAC Engineer in Moserbaer Engineering & Construction Ltd .  Since
09th April 2012 to 08 September 2015.
3) Worked as a Engineer Project in APC Air Systems Pvt. Ltd.   From January 2011 to
March 2012.
Job Responsibilities:- 
Make Plan man power mobilization according to front availability.
Make schedule and plan material delivery at site.
Plan inspection of material.
Ensuring the availability of material at site.
Check for installation of water cooled Chiller, Air cooled Chiller, Water package Unit, AHU,
FCU, Duct, Pipe, Pump, fans,VRV & VRF  and other equipment etc as per drawing.Manage all Documentation related to site.
Certify bills of contractor.
Manage all activities related to site.
Make Plan for the erection schedule to meet the target.
Preparation and submission of field engineering query and obtains technical approval.
Preparation  of  isometric  drawing  from  general  arrangement  &  detailing  of  isometric
drawing for site work.
Confirmation of material specification and preparation of technical information for material
procurement enquiries.
Submission of material approval forms and obtains approval for alternate material.
Monitoring of incoming site material movement as per plan & monitoring of customer site
material receiving position.
Dealing with clients at site, directing manpower at site.
Handling the entire site, erection and commissioning of System.
Submission of daily progress report.
Designing Attributes:-
Heat Load Calculation, System Design, Duct sizing, CHW pipe Sizing & Layout Drawing
preparation through Design Team.
HVAC equipment selection.
Pump head calculation & pump selection.
Design of Ventilation system.
BOQ (Bill of Quantity) preparation for HVAC systems.
Checking of prepared Shop Drawings, Getting approval from Consultants.
Preparation of Technical submittal as per specification, Compliance statement review from
supplier and approval through Consultant.
ESP and Pressure Drop Calculation of the system.
PROJECTS HANDLED:-
DMRC Project Line-8, CE 10 & 11. Janakpuri West to Botanical Garden Phase 3 Lot 4.
2x600 MW Moserbaer Thermal Power Project, Anuppur(M.P.).
Munjal Auto Ltd. Haridwar (U.K.).
High School passed in 2002 with 2nd Division from U.P Board.
Intermediate passed in 2004 with 2nd Division from U.P Board.
B.Tech (Mechanical & Automation ) passed in 2011 with 1st Division from Al-
Falah School Of Engg. & Tech . Faridabad, MDU Rohtak (Haryana).
Certificate course in  HVAC DESIGNING AND DRAFTING  from MEP CENTER
DHANUSH ENGGSERVIES (INDIA) Pvt. Ltd.  in JULY, 2014 from DELHI.ACADEMIAOperating System  :   Windows 7 & 8, XP, Vista
Designing Skill       :   PDS, Microstation, Navis Works, AutoCAD, Solid Works
Others               :   Ms Office (Word, Excel, Power Point) & Ms Project
Date of Birth             :     15th June, 1986
Nationality                :     Indian
Sex                          :     Male
Marital Status           :     Unmarried
Languages Known    :     English, Hindi and Urdu.
